com.percussion.uicontext
Class PSManageActionInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.uicontext.PSManageActionInfo

public class PSManageActionInfo
extends Object

Load and manage action information in the user session. Used by the filtering exit PSFilterContextMenuto obtain information about each action.

Method Detail

ensureActionsLoaded

public void ensureActionsLoaded(Collection actionids,
                                IPSRequestContext request)
                         throws PSException
Ensure that the list of action ids are known about in the current request context's session.

Parameters:
actionids - A list of action ids, must never be null
request - The current request context, must never be null
Throws:
PSException - if a problem occurs loading the action information

getActionVisibility

public PSActionVisibilityContexts getActionVisibility(String actionid,
                                                      IPSRequestContext req)
Get the visibility for a specific action.

Parameters:
actionid - the id of the action, must never be null or empty
req - the current request context, must never be null
Returns:
the visibility contexts or null if the action is not loaded.

isActionAnItem

public boolean isActionAnItem(String actionid,
                              IPSRequestContext req)
Check the given action to see if it is an item.

Parameters:
actionid - the id of the action, must never be null or empty
req - the current request context, must never be null
Returns:
true if the given action is an item and not a menu

loadActions

protected PSAction[] loadActions(PSComponentProcessorProxy proc,
                                 String[] ids)
                          throws PSException
Loads the specified actions from the repository.

Parameters:
proc - The processor to use, may not be null.
id - An array of action ids, may not be null or empty. Additionally, no element may be empty.
Returns:
The actions, may be empty, but never null. Specific elements may be null if the corresponding action isn't found or the action does not meet the leaf state passed.
Throws:
PSException - if there is a problem with loading the action elements.
IllegalArgumentException - if any param is invalid.
com.percussion.deploy.error.PSDeployException - if there are any errors.

isLeaf

protected boolean isLeaf(PSAction action)
Determines if the supplied action is a leaf (an item or a dynamic menu, not a cascading category).

Parameters:
action - The action, may not be null.
Returns:
true if it is a leaf, false otherwise.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any param is invalid.
